text: After the war South Korea was nothing-- what they did to have a booming economy? Nag meeting yung mga mayayamang tao sa bansa nila at nag usap sila na walang makakatulong sa kanila kundi yung sarili nilang mamamayan. Nag ambag ambag sila at tumulong sa pagbibigay ng trabaho sa kanilang mamamayan - sa Pinas hindi mangyayari yan yung mga mayayaman eh tatakbo para maging senator or congressman/mayor or governor at iisipin paano makapagnakaw sa kanilang posisyon para madagdagan yung yaman nila. And to think mga madasalin sila at palaging nasa simbahan

text: Fernandez Marco if it is the vastness of the area that would serve as the basis on determining whether the landowner is rich or poor, then the tribal communities which own thousands of ancestral domains would be billionaires. It is the productivity of the farm, actually and rolly tugades property except for the lake, half hectare rice field and several hectares of undulating area for corn is mostly hills and mounds of limestone where nothing grows except trees and shrubs. By my standard, he is poor income wise.

text: i personally know some family who owns hectares of land but they are poor because the land they own does not produce as much crops. almost just enough for the family's consumption. the land in rural areas lalo na kung sa mga bulobundukin don't really produce as much income compared sa mga nasa urban areas. unless kung ginagamit talaga sya for production of palay, sugarcane, kopra, etc... still, depende pa rin yon if me mill ka na sarili pero madalang yung ganun. ğŸ˜”
author: Joanna Lytal

text: Fernandez Marco farmers who owned 40 hectares may be rich or poor depende sa location at probnsya sir And Sabhin na naten Hnd masydo probnsya usually owning a land alone wont make you rich unless you sell it(again depende sa probnsya pa at location) And judging from the post they even need to allocate 1 hectare for water irrigation Meaning the land cant be that productive.  And if you know how farmers barely get back their investment and Just a few to spare to luckyly survive till next harvest I will really believe sir Manny if he consider him as poor  Sabi ng magsasaka isang kahig isang tuka nlng Ngun. (hopefully and thanks to hardwork of our good secretary Sna ma uplift na tlg mga farmers)  Bottomline usually mayaman lang sila pa sa titulo  Pro if d mo benta yan same lang buhay nila
